references.paper_title: Windows agent arena: Evaluating multi-modal os agents at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces the WinAgentArena benchmark, which is used as an evaluation environment in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Navigating the digital world as humans do: Universal visual grounding for gui agents
references.reason: This paper introduces universal visual grounding for GUI agents, which is a core component in the approach taken by the current work.

references.paper_title: Kto: Model alignment as prospect theoretic optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces Kahneman-Tversky Optimization (KTO), which is used to optimize the agent in the current work.

references.paper_title: Omniparser for pure vision based gui agent
references.reason: This paper introduces OmniParser for pure vision-based GUI agents, and it's used as a comparison method and component of other methods.

references.paper_title: Qwen2-vl: Enhancing vision-language model's perception of the world at any resolution
references.reason: This paper presents Qwen2-VL, which is used as the base vision language model for UI-grounding in the current work.
